title: Enquirer or "tabloid" fonts
content:
What is (are) the typical fonts used for headlines used in the National Enquirer or Weekly World News?

thank you,

doug
author: df234

comments.content:
WWN uses Futura Extra Bold and Futura Extra Bold Condensed. Don't know about the others.

- Lex

P.S. WWN also uses various weights of Interstate (all stretched and squooshed) inside their magazine.

I think the Enquirer uses [Rhode](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318013458/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/Rhode) or [Titling Gothic.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150318013458/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/TitlingGothicFB)
